# ViewLegacy

namespace: [VoldeNuit.Framework.Display](/Display/Display.md)

>Note: It is not recommended to use. Please use the [Camera](./Camera.md) instead.

```C#
public static class ViewLegacy
```

>Note: _IViewLegacy is internal interface for legacy support.
